import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Nav1 from "./Nav" import Footer from "./Footer" import {Card,Button,Row,Dropdown,Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useState } from 'react' import { getProducts } from '../config/Proservice' export default function Products() { const [product,setproduct]= useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ getProducts().then((res)=>{ console.log(res.data) setproduct(res.data) }) },[]) return (




Color brown black grey

Category sofa table chair wardrobe

Products

{product.map((value,index) =>{ return( {value.product_name} Price:{value.product_cost}/-    

)} )}


) }
